actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration (without written report).

official_title: A resolution to pay a gratuity to Marjorie Iverson; Eugene Bergstrom; Jack Bergstrom; Lorraine Powers; Robert  Bergstrom; Patricia Hurt; Harriett McCollum; Barbara Hickman; and Marilyn Fernandes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay certain brothers and sisters of a deceased employee of the Senate a specified sum.

titles.title: A resolution to pay a gratuity to Marjorie Iverson; Eugene Bergstrom; Jack Bergstrom; Lorraine Powers; Robert  Bergstrom; Patricia Hurt; Harriett McCollum; Barbara Hickman; and Marilyn Fernandes.
